item.title: Fire Extinguisher Squib Test (Engine, APU, Lower Cargo)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided it is verified that the failure is in the light circuit.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to SQUIB TEST module on the pilots overhead panel: "FIRE EXT SQUIB TEST SYS INOP”. Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: Individual fire extinguisher bottle squib test failures may be permitted. Refer to MEL items 26-22-X, 26-23-X, or 26-24-X for possible relief.

maintenance.para: Perform the Squib Discharge Circuit Test portion of the Fire Extinguisher Bottle Squib System Test:
